abstract: Daniel M Gold reviews Steve Mims documentary film Starving the Beast.

headline.print_headline: Review: ‘Starving the Beast’ Traces the Burdens of Higher Education Defunding
headline.main: Review: ‘Starving the Beast’ Traces the Burdens of Higher Education Defunding

snippet: This documentary by Steve Mims describes an ideological war over public higher education that is being conducted state by state....
lead_paragraph: This documentary by Steve Mims describes an ideological war over public higher education that is being conducted state by state.
